TypeSignature.Value: public class Rss20ItemFormatter<TSyndicationItem> : System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter where TSyndicationItem : SyndicationItemnew()
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Rss20ItemFormatter`1<.ctor (class System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem) TSyndicationItem> extends System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter

Docs.summary: A class that serializes -derived classes to and from RSS 2.0 format.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>-derived classes and to create instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>-derived classes from XML documents that represent RSS 2.0 items. If you need to serialize a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter> formatter.
## Examples The following code shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> derived class and serialize it to RSS 2.0.
[!code-csharp[RssFormatter#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/rssformatter/cs/snippets.cs#10)] [!code-vb[RssFormatter#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/rssformatter/vb/snippets.vb#10)]

Docs.param: A value that specifies whether to serialize elements that are defined in the Atom 1.0 specification but not in the RSS 2.0 specification. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified derived instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, all elements defined in the Atom 1.0 specification that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification are serialized with the Atom 1.0 namespace.
